articles.description: Captain Ben Stokes says he can accept criticism of his England team but believes allegations of arrogance are “too far”.
articles.title: The Ashes: Ben Stokes says calling England arrogant is 'too far'

articles.description: Lando Norris qualifies only third for the sprint race at the Qatar Grand Prix on the weekend the McLaren driver could clinch the world title for the first time.
articles.title: Qatar GP 2025: Piastri takes Qatar sprint pole ahead of Norris

articles.description: Ole Gunnar Solskjaer discusses Manchester United, the career he'd have chosen if he wasn't in football, and the team he'd like to manage.
articles.title: Ole Gunnar Solskjaer: Man Utd legend talks about his career, his unusual talent and his love of Championship Manager

articles.description: Pressure is increasing on manager Thomas Frank to improve Tottenham's home form. But why are they struggling on their own turf?
articles.title: Why are Tottenham struggling at home in Premier League?

articles.description: As Ronnie O'Sullivan prepares to turn 50 like Mark Williams and John Higgins, BBC Sport looks at why the Class of 92 are still at the top of snooker.
articles.title: UK Championship 2025: Ronnie O'Sullivan, John Higgins and Mark Williams shining at 50

articles.description: France captain Antoine Dupont will make his return from a serious knee injury in Toulouse's Top 14 match against Racing 92 on Saturday (20:00 GMT).
articles.title: Antoine Dupont: France captain set for Toulouse return after eight months out

articles.description: New York Jets cornerback Kris Boyd is readmitted to hospital as he recovers from being shot in the abdomen.
articles.title: NFL: New York Jets' Kris Boyd back in hospital to continue recovery after shooting

articles.description: Frazer Clarke says he is taking inspiration from former foe Fabio Wardley and believes he still has what it takes to become a world champion.
articles.title: Frazer Clarke vs TKV: Olympian being inspired by Fabio Wardley

articles.description: The Chicago Bears win 24-15 in Philadelphia to strengthen their position at the top of a competitive NFC North table.
articles.title: Chicago Bears beat Philadelphia Eagles 24-15 to stretch NFL winning streak to five matches

articles.description: South Africa's double World Cup winning captain Siya Kolisi has no doubts about the validity of the Springboks' game against Wales.
articles.title: Wales v South Africa: Springboks captain Siya Kolisi annoyed by fixture negativity
